department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)&
description: This contract is for the construction of shoreline protection at Loggiecroft wharf
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

**Title:** EC015-231738-Shoreline Protection at Loggiecroft, New Brunswick

**Reference:** WS3993133663-Doc4001263213

**Brief Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites bidders to provide shoreline protection and installation services at the Loggiecroft Wharf in New Brunswick.

**Key Details:**

* **UNSPSC Categories:** Heavy construction machinery and equipment, earth moving machinery, heavy equipment components, and environmental protection.
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding.
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price.
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick.
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
* **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Tender Description:**

The work involved in this project includes the furnishing of all necessary labour, equipment, and materials for the construction of shoreline protection and installation of owner-supplied docks at the Loggiecroft Wharf. The contractor will perform the work in accordance with the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.118567.001.

**Timeline:**

* **Deadline for Submissions:** 2023-05-26T14:00:00.
* **Estimated Contract Start Date:** Not specified.
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified.
* **Work Completion Date:** July 31, 2023.

**Security and Accessibility:**

* **Bid Security:** Standard bid and contract security is required.
* **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Information:**

For more information regarding this tender announcement, please visit the URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16234249?extsite=MTYyMzQyNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16234249?extsite=MTYyMzQyNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or inquiries regarding this tender announcement, please contact Sonia Stockman, SPAC/PSPC, at sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.  ...Pokud si přečtete pouze anglickou verze, možná budete mít obav
